channel.title: Container on Midnight Programmer
channel.description: Recent content in Container on Midnight Programmer

item.title: Hosting Draw.IO In Azure Web App Containers
item.description: Draw.IO is a great alternative for Microsoft Visio. It allows me to quickly draw flowcharts and diagrams. I have been using this for a long time and the best part is that Draw.IO is open source on Github with web and offline (desktop) version. I personally use desktop version but what if I would like to host it in my own org or would like to work with the web instance instead of the desktop version.
